SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Other Fixes in B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (Version 4.10)

Have confidence that the issues related to performance or buyer experience that you've reported are resolved appropriately. This release includes several fixes that resulted from your submitted cases.

NOTE
Some fixes were also patched in previous versions of B2B Commerce for Visualforce. If you're upgrading from a version where a fix was patched, you probably already resolved any required upgrade steps.
Some fixes update default handlebars.js templates that render components on the storefront. If you've previously overridden a default template that receives a fix, reimplement your customizations based on the fixed version of the default template. This step ensures that custom code in your solution receives the benefit of the fix.
ID	ALSO PATCHED IN	FIX
W-5829737	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) patch 3.136.13	Fixed an issue where the Component_MiniCart_Items page label didn't display correctly in the header.
W-5755930	—	Fixed an issue where a sitemap ignored storefront association values when constructing a storefront URL.
W-5708266	—	Fixed an issue where the address carousel automatically scrolled when a logged-in buyer edited addresses during line-level independent checkout.
W-5682730	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) patch 3.136.12	Fixed an issue where a customer service representative (CSR) user couldn't see a buyer's shipping addresses during line-level independent checkout.
W-5669694	—	Fixed an issue where the ccrz.ccApiCart.removeFrom() method didn't properly delete cart items created from attribute-driven commerce products.
W-5656203	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) patch 3.136.11	Fixed an issue where the same shipping address was incorrectly applied to all shipping groups during line-level independent checkout. This issue occurred when a buyer used the address book to select different shipping addresses for different shipping groups.
W-5623555	—	Fixed an issue where a dynamic kit could be added to a cart without selecting a product from a required product group.
W-5602620	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) patch 3.136.9	Fixed an issue where a single quote character in a product name caused an error when sorting by name on the Product List page version 2.0.
W-5595784	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) patch 3.136.6	Fixed an issue where building a product index on a storefront that supports multiple locales failed due to SOQL query limits.
W-5589786	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) patch 3.136.6	Fixed an issue where the product index included products whose price list end dates already expired.
W-5555745	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) patch 3.136.6	Fixed an issue where the Product List page version 2.0 didn't display the total count of results. This issue occurred when the Show Total Product Count and Create Master Index For All Currencies configurations were enabled.
W-5513576	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) patch 3.136.6	Fixed an issue where a user assigned to the site guest user profile couldn't self-register after a new installation.
W-5491667	—	Fixed an issue where the Product Detail page performed a redundant remote action call to ccrz.cc_ctrl_WishlistPicker.fetchLightWishlists() for populating the wish list selector.
W-5487846	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) patch 3.136.4	Fixed an issue where overriding price logic did not correctly handle effective dates for price list items.
W-5469565	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) patch 3.136.4	Fixed an issue where a price in the product index did not properly round to two decimal places. This issue affected only some orgs.
W-5451277	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) patch 3.136.1	Fixed an issue where the job that creates the product index is not properly scoped to the price list items of the master price list. This issue affected only solutions that use the master index for all currencies strategy for product index records.
W-5380522	—	Fixed an issue where a requested delivery date didn't transfer correctly from a cart to an order. Now, if a cart item's Requested Delivery Date is blank, the resulting order item's Request Delivery Date matches the cart's Requested Delivery Date created during checkout. Both the cart item and order item retain the default Requested Delivery Date, which is the date when the item was added to the cart.
W-5331972	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) patch 3.136.1	Fixed an issue where a product media record displayed even when the Enabled field wasn't selected.
W-5171671	—	Fixed an issue where typing a semicolon or colon in the Search field in the header instantly executed the search.
DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
Let us know so we can improve!
Yes
No
title: B2B Commerce for Visualforce Release Notes and Upgrade Guide
